categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic sector forces

nodes.text: The Trax Sector Force was the total military assets of the Alliance to Restore the Republic operating in the Trax sector during the Galactic Civil War. Under the command of Beckar, the Trax Sector Force consisted of an Assault Frigate, an EF76 Nebulon-B escort frigate Defector, fifteen corvettes, and two DP20 frigates, Corellian Thunder and Dream Runner, and thirty-five starfighters. The main sector command base was located on Entrus, while starfighter repairs were conducted at a base in the Dresscol system. Capital ships were docked in the Ventil system.
